entry.title: RT rahat.eth: You might have heard about Account Abstraction. Everyone is talking about it, but it's still hard to follow and figure out how we can ta...
entry.summary: RT rahat.eth You might have heard about Account Abstraction. Everyone is talking about it, but it's still hard to follow and figure out how we can take advantage of it as developers. This is the first in a series of threads to get you up to speed on Account Abstraction! https://t.co/ypnEmDMkwK
